ApproxsimClient.substrate
Class PolygonMaker

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.substrate.ShapeMaker
      ApproxsimClient.substrate.PolygonMaker

public class PolygonMaker
extends ShapeMaker

This class implements methods used to construct, change and move polygonials.

addPoint

protected void addPoint(Point point)
Adds new point to the polygonial. This method is used while the polygonial is beeing created.

Parameters:
point - point to be added to the polygonial.

addMapPointAdapter

Adds a MapPointAdapter to the list.

addMapLineAdapter

protected void addMapLineAdapter(Line line)
Adds a MapLineAdapter to the list.

addLastLine

protected void addLastLine()
Completes the polygonial by adding a line between the last and the first points in the list. If the polygonial cannot be created all the points and lines are removed from the creator.

movePolygonPoint

protected void movePolygonPoint(Point point,
                                double lon,
                                double lat)
Moves a point of the polygon.

Parameters:
point - the actual point.
lon - new longitude of the point.
lat - new latitude of the point.

insertPoint

public void insertPoint(Point point,
                        MapLineAdapter lineAdapter)
Inserts new point into the polygonial.

Parameters:
point - the point to be inserted.
lineAdapter - line adapter of the line which is divided by the inserted point into two new lines.

moveShape

public void moveShape(double lon,
                      double lat)
Moves the area in the chosen direction.

Specified by:
moveShape in class ShapeMaker
Parameters:
lon - longitude of the new center of the polygons bounding box.
lat - latitude of the new center of the polygons bounding box.
